about_the_game:
★About DLC1★

This DLC is Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy's first combat expansion.

Cirno, the Hero of Ice, receives a mysterious letter which turns out to be an invitation from the super popular idol, The Underworld Rose.
Egged on by the idol-loving rabbits, Cirno heads to the performance stage where she meets with unexpected danger...

★DLC Content★

  • A much anticipated Character
  • Two spectacular Battles
  • Three exquisite Songs
  • Four entertaining Spell cards/Items

*This DLC includes the Original Soundtracks of the new songs

We'll do our best to finish DLC1 as soon as possible. We hope you'll continue to keep Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy on your radar. Thank you!
